Articles.Content:
just a few tips, the rest is on the link i will give you:

these guys are developing a Do It Yourself open source suborbital space program.

on their blog you can get all the info about their projects, lots of data, videos and so on.

Here it is and have fun:

http://www.copenhagensuborbitals.com/
They actually have an account on this Forum:D

Yeah, Copenhagen Suborbitals. Great guys. They already launched their first controlled rocket, the "Saphire" !

A couple of days ago they posted something here on the forums.
Not quite. We are planning to launch Saphire in mid June.
Don't these guys also have a ridiculously awesome mini submarine too?
